game_description: Fly using just the movement of your body! Rug Riders is a magic carpet simulator with a unique movement system that's so authentic, it feels like you're flying a real magic carpet! Blast enemies with fireballs in the 18 battles, unlock gold medals on the 12 races, or just enjoy flying around the sprawling landscape. Join the Discord. (https://discord.gg/UucU2CtKba) Keep up to date with Middle Man Games on Twitter. (https://twitter.com/MiddleManGames1)
